viewData.name: Lenovo 13.3" ThinkPad L380 Yoga Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop (Black)
viewData.short_description: Buy Lenovo 13.3" ThinkPad L380 Yoga Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop (Black) featuring 1.7 GHz Intel Core i5-8350U Quad-Core, 8GB DDR4 | 256GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD 13.3" 1920 x 1080" IPS Display. Review Lenovo L380 Yoga
viewData.long_description: The 13.3" ThinkPad L380 Yoga Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop from Lenovo is designed for business purposes, featuring the performance, security, and portability users need. Specs-wise, it's powered by a 1.7 GHz Intel Core i5-8350U quad-core processor, 8GB of DDR4 RAM, and a 256GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD. Should you need more room, you can attach external storage solutions using its USB ports, as well as quickly offload data to other devices with its microSD card reader.  Its 13.3" display, driven by integrated Intel UHD graphics, features a 1920 x 1080 resolution for crisp and clear Full HD playback. Moreover, it has an HDMI port that you can use for connecting a display for larger viewing and enhanced multitasking. Other integrated features include a fingerprint reader, Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac), Gigabit Ethernet LAN, Bluetooth 4.1, a webcam, a microphone, speakers, and an audio in/out jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro.
